p: Total RNA was isolated using TRIzol (Invitrogen, Carlsbad, CA, USA). RT & Go Mastermix (MP Biomedicals, Seoul, Korea) was used to prepare cDNA by implementing the manufacturerâ€™s protocols. As described in Supplementary Table S1, various primers were used to perform RT-PCR using a PCR Thermal Cycler Dice TP600 (Takara Bio, Inc., Otsu, Japan) [ 17].
